Constructor Detail

SearchPanel

public SearchPanel(int TableRows,
                   java.lang.Object[][] TableData,
                   javax.swing.JTable Table,
                   java.lang.String[] SearchOptions)
Creates new form SearchPanel The following parameters need to be passed 1> int TableRows: no. rows present in the parent table 2> Object[][] TableData: The entire data present in the table 3> javax.swing.JTable Table: The parent table whose elements are to be searched 4>String[] SearchOptions: The no. of columns of the table to be searched- these elements are added in the "Search"JComboBox

Method Detail

sortStrings

public void sortStrings(java.lang.Object[][] rawData,
                        int rows,
                        int colNo)
Method to obtain a sorted one-dimensional array from the raw two-dimensional array present in the table. Parameters passed: 1.Object[][] rawData: two-dimensional array containing raw data 2.int rows: no. of rows in the table 3.int colNo: the index of the column which is to be sorted

displaySearch

public void displaySearch()
Method to highlight the search element typed in the "Search" JTextField(if it exists) in the parent-JTable

search

public void search()
Method to find if the letters typed in yhe "Search"JTextField exists in the table. If it exists, it is highlighted in the parent-JTable. Otherwise, a suitable message is displayed

searchElement

public int searchElement(java.lang.String key,
                         java.lang.String[] a)
Method to find the index the of an element "key" in an one-dimensional String array "a" Parameters passed: 1.String key 2.String[] a

searchCancelPressed

public void searchCancelPressed()
Conviniebce method to take appropriate actions when "Search Cancel"JButton is pressed
